name: Iced Latte
ingredients: Optional: 1 teaspoon simple syrup or vanilla syrup
instructions: Brew two shots of espresso and let them cool slightly.
Fill a tall glass with ice cubes.
Pour in the espresso, then top with cold milk.
Add syrup if desired and stir before serving.

name: Cold Brew Coffee
instructions: Combine ground coffee and cold water in a large jar or French press.
Stir well to saturate the grounds.
Cover and refrigerate for 12–18 hours.
Strain through a fine mesh sieve or coffee filter.
Serve over ice, with milk or syrup if desired.

name: Greek Frappé
instructions: In a shaker or jar, combine instant coffee, sugar, and 2 tablespoons cold water.
Shake or blend until thick foam forms.
Fill a tall glass with ice, pour in the foam.
Top with cold milk or water.
Serve with a straw.

name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee (Cà Phê Sữa Đá)
instructions: Place condensed milk in a tall glass.
Brew coffee using a Vietnamese phin filter over the glass with condensed milk.
Stir to combine.
Add ice cubes and serve immediately.

name: Virgin Mojito
instructions: In a glass, muddle mint leaves, sugar, and lime wedges.
Fill with ice cubes.
Top with soda water and stir.
Garnish with extra mint.

name: Shirley Temple
instructions: Fill a glass with ice.
Pour ginger ale and lemon-lime soda over ice.
Add grenadine and stir gently.
Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

name: Nojito
instructions: Muddle mint, sugar, and lime juice in a glass.
Add ice cubes.
Top with tonic water and stir.
Garnish with lime wedge.

name: Lemon-Basil Cooler
instructions: Muddle basil leaves with lemon juice and simple syrup.
Add water and stir.
Serve over ice, garnished with basil sprig.

name: Agua Fresca de Sandía (Watermelon)
instructions: Blend watermelon, water, sugar, and lime juice until smooth.
Strain if desired.
Serve chilled over ice.

name: Margarita
instructions: Rub lime on the rim of a glass and dip into salt.
Shake tequila, triple sec, lime juice, and ice in a shaker.
Strain into the glass with fresh ice.
Serve with lime wedge.

name: Mojito
instructions: Muddle mint, sugar, and lime in a glass.
Fill with ice.
Add rum and stir.
Top with soda water and garnish with mint.

name: Old Fashioned
instructions: Place sugar cube in a glass and saturate with bitters.
Add a splash of water and muddle.
Fill glass with ice and add whiskey.
Stir gently and garnish with orange peel.

name: Piña Colada
instructions: Blend rum, coconut cream, pineapple juice, and crushed ice until smooth.
Pour into a chilled glass.
Garnish with pineapple wedge and cherry.

name: Negroni
instructions: Fill a glass with ice.
Pour in gin, Campari, and vermouth.
Stir well.
Garnish with orange peel.

name: Espresso Martini
instructions: Shake vodka, coffee liqueur, espresso, and ice in a shaker.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with coffee beans.

name: Mango Lassi
instructions: Blend mango pulp, yogurt, milk, sugar, and cardamom until smooth.
Serve chilled.

name: Sugarcane Juice
instructions: Extract juice from sugarcane stalks using a press.
Stir in lime juice and ginger if desired.
Serve over ice.

name: Fresh Lemonade
instructions: Mix lemon juice and sugar until sugar dissolves.
Add cold water and stir.
Serve over ice.

name: Orange Julius
instructions: Blend orange juice, milk, sugar, vanilla, and ice until frothy.
Serve immediately.

name: Tamarind Agua Fresca
instructions: Soak tamarind pulp in 1 cup hot water for 20 minutes.
Strain to remove seeds and fibers.
Mix with 3 cups cold water and sugar.
Serve chilled over ice.

name: Moroccan Mint Tea
instructions: Rinse tea leaves with a little boiling water and discard water.
Add tea, mint, and sugar to pot.
Fill with boiling water and steep 5 minutes.
Pour from height into glasses to create foam.
Repeat pouring back into pot 2–3 times before serving.

name: Karkadeh (Hibiscus Tea)
instructions: Rinse hibiscus petals under cold water.
Steep in cold water for 4–8 hours.
Strain and stir in sugar.
Serve chilled over ice.

name: Bubble Tea (Boba Milk Tea)
instructions: Cook tapioca pearls until soft and coat in brown sugar syrup.
Steep black tea in hot water 5–8 minutes, then cool.
Divide pearls into glasses, add ice.
Pour tea and top with milk.
Stir and serve with wide straw.

name: Flat White
instructions: Brew a double ristretto and pour into small cup.
Steam milk until silky microfoam forms.
Pour over espresso, creating a thin flat layer of foam.
Serve immediately.

name: Glögg (Scandinavian Mulled Wine)
instructions: Heat wine, aquavit, and spices gently without boiling.
Simmer 1 hour to infuse.
Stir in sugar until dissolved.
Serve warm with raisins and almonds in the mug.

name: Kava (Fiji/Polynesia)
instructions: Place kava powder in muslin bag and submerge in cool water.
Knead and squeeze 10–15 minutes until water is cloudy.
Remove bag and discard root.
Serve immediately in coconut shells (bilo).

name: Terremoto (Chile)
instructions: Place pineapple ice cream scoops in large glass.
Pour Pipeño wine over ice cream.
Top with grenadine or Fernet.
Serve with straw and long spoon.

name: Arnold Palmer
instructions: Fill glass with ice.
Pour iced tea and lemonade in equal parts.
Stir gently.
Garnish with lemon slice.
